DeWalt 20V MAX Compact Drill/Driver: While it offers lower torque compared to the Bosch and Metabo HPT models, this drill has a dual-speed transmission, an ergonomic grip, and a lightweight design, making it ideal for tight spaces and general DIY tasks.
